```{r , echo=F, include=F, warning=F, message=F, error=F}
library(ggplot2)
library(pander)
library(kableExtra)
library(CodebookGenerator)
library(DT)
```

```{r , echo=F, include=F, warning=F, message=F, error=F}
codebookDF <- iris
```

******************************************************************************************
## Data Frame Summary
```{r , echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
kable(CodebookGenerator::summarizeDataFrame(codebookDF), digits=1) %>%
kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover","condensed"),full_width = F)
```

******************************************************************************************
## Variable Summary
```{r , echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

```

### <a name="Sepal.Length"></a>Sepal.Length

<div class = "row">
<div class = "col-lg-1 Continous">
<div class="classholder" >Continous</div>

</div>
<div class = "col-lg-3">
```{r , echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
tab <- variableOverview(codebookDF[["Sepal.Length"]])
 kable(tab, digits=1) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover","condensed")) 
```


</div>
<div class = "col-lg-4">
```{r , echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
tab <- summarizeVariable(codebookDF[["Sepal.Length"]], "Continous")
 kable(tab, digits=1) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover","condensed"))
```


</div>
<div class = "col-lg-4">
```{r , echo=FALSE, fig.width=4, fig.height=3, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
var <- codebookDF[['Sepal.Length']]
bw=(max(var, na.rm=T)-min(var, na.rm=T))/30
m <- mean(var, na.rm=T)
sd <- sd(var, na.rm=T)
n <- length(!is.na(var))

                   
                  class(codebookDF[['Sepal.Length']]) <- NULL
                  ggplot(data=codebookDF)+
                   geom_histogram(aes(Sepal.Length),color='black',bins=30)+
                   theme_minimal()+
                         stat_function(fun = function(x, mean, sd, n, bw){
                   dnorm(x = x, mean = mean, sd = sd) * bw * n},
                   args = c(mean = m, sd = sd, n = n, bw = bw), color='red')
                   
```


</div>
</div>
